snippet: Mr. Silva earned two Emmy Awards for his pioneering technical work, including for his conversion of a small helicopter into the first airborne virtual television studio.
abstract: John Daniel Silva, KTLA chief engineer who designed the first television news helicopter, which became the basic tool of live television traffic reporting and disaster coverage, dies at age 92.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Silva earned two Emmy Awards for his pioneering technical work, including for his conversion of a small helicopter into the first airborne virtual television studio.

headline.seo: John Silva, Maker of ‘Telecopter’ Camera, Dies at 92
headline.main: John Silva, Father of Helicopter Journalism, Dies at 92
